title: Deputy Chairman Senate expresses grief over losses due to rains, floods
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 19 (APP):Deputy Chairman Senate, Senator Syedaal Khan Nasar, on Monday, expressed deep sorrow over the loss of lives and property caused by heavy rains and floods in various parts of the country, particularly in Balochistan.
In a message, he said that witnessing the devastation caused by the rains is heartbreaking, and he stands in solidarity with the victims in their time of grief.
He prayed for the swift recovery of the injured and emphasized the need to accelerate rescue and relief operations. He also called on philanthropists to come forward and support the affected people during this challenging time.
